comments:
Build 20011127

The algorithm to reproduce the bug follows:
1. Create an empty Java project
2. Create source folder "src" and the bin folder "bin" (using the project-> 
properties->Java Build Path)
3. Copy source java files (using file manager) into "src" folder
4. Call "Refresh from Local"
5. Project->Properties->Team->set the repository
6. Team->Replace with stream contents
7. The Progress monitor task is blinking (bug 6344 - I found it earlier)
8. See the error and the following stacktrace


Log: Thu Dec 06 13:41:49 MSK 2001

Oops!
It seems to be not reproduceable... :-((
Actually there was another bug accompanying this - whaen I tried to open the 
Java Build Path page from the project properties another exception was thrown.

Unfortunitely I cannot reproduce it myself. :-((
I guess that the log is caused by the inability to load ".classpath" correctly 
or smth like this...
*** This bug has been marked as a duplicate of 6273 ***
